text: Thomas Hopko (March 28, 1939 – March 18, 2015) was an Eastern Orthodox Christian priest and theologian. He was the Dean of Saint Vladimir’s Orthodox Theological Seminary from September 1992 until July 1, 2002 and taught dogmatic theology there from 1968 until 2002. In retirement, he carried the honorary title of Dean Emeritus. Hopko died of complications from congestive heart failure on March 18, 2015, in Wexford, Pennsylvania, aged 75. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American theologians Category:People from Endicott, New York
